children.name: Crypto Testers
children.description: Cryptotesters is your go-to resource to navigate the crypto universe. We help you find the best cryptocurrency exchanges, wallets and much more.

children.name: Tx Street
children.description: TxStreet is a live blockchain transaction and mempool visualizer. Each person represents a single transaction happening in real time. Each house represents a type of transaction. Each bus represents a future block.

children.name: Gitcoin quests
children.description: Gitcoin Quests is a fun, gamified way to learn about the web3 ecosystem, compete with your friends, earn rewards, and level up your decentralization-fu! Explore. Learn. Battle Baddies. Win Rewards.

children.name: Rabbithole
children.description: Earn crypto by using the latest decentralized apps. Become an early adopter of new projects, and earn crypto as a reward.

children.name: Unmask crypto
children.description: Unmask Crypto is a platform that educates you on the many benefits and risks involved in owning and trading cryptocurrency.

children.name: Binance academy
children.description: Welcome to Binance Academy! We're on a mission to educate the masses on the transformative potential of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. On this website, you'll find over 280 articles covering everything from computer security to economics. Oh, and they're in 21 different languages.

children.name: Gemini cryptopedia
children.description: Cryptopedia is a platform where experts can deliver a deeper level of knowledge about their crypto projects. Learn about some of the most prominent, promising, and innovative crypto protocols in the world directly from the people that created them.

children.name: The daily ape
children.description: The Daily Ape is your resource for all things degen. This free, resource-driven Telegram group aggregates the top tweets, stories and developments from established and rising projects and shares them in a daily update to stay informed on the latest progressions in DeFi and beyond.

children.name: Blockchain glossary by Bison Trails
children.description: This living document by Bison Trails is a non-exhaustive list of key blockchain terms. Click through on each term for a longer explanation.

children.name: StakeDAO
children.description: Your end-to-end learning hub for all things Crypto and DeFi

children.name: Rainbow
children.description: The perfect beginner's guide to crypto

children.name: Crypto fees
children.description: CryptoFees.info is a website displaying fee data for blockchains and blockchain applications, like decentralized exchanges, lending protocols, etc.

children.name: Eth burned
children.description: The more Ethereum is used... the more ETH is burned

children.name: Money movers
children.description: Which blockchain is settling more value?

children.name: Open orgs
children.description: DAOs are the new companies. What's on their balance sheets?

children.name: Ethereum nodes
children.description: Dashboard of all Ethereum nodes and their current status

children.name: Coin98
children.description: Coin98 is a multi-chain wallet & DeFi Gateway designed to seamlessly connect users to the crypto world in a safe and secure manner.

children.name: Crypto art data
children.description: Crypto Art Data is a platform that aggredates multiple datasets and creates indicators about the NFT space. As well as this, it also showcases some of the most expensive NFTs across multiple platforms

children.name: Crypto fees
children.description: Crypto Fees aggrigates the generated fees of multiple crypto platforms (Layer 1's and Layer 2's) and displays them in a ranked order from highest generated fees to lowest.

children.name: Decrypt
children.description: Decrypt is a journalistic platform that keeps its audience up to date with the lastest events happening in the cryptocurrency space.

children.name: Defiant
children.description: Defiant is a journalistic platform that keeps its audience up to date with the lastest events happening in the cryptocurrency space.

children.name: Deribit insights
children.description: Deribit Insights (subsidiary of Deribit Exchange) is a journalistic platform that keeps its audience up to date with the lastest events happening in the cryptocurrency space.

children.name: Dune analytics
children.description: Dune Analytics is a platform that aggredates multiple datasets and creates indicators about protocols in the DeFi space.

children.name: Gabriel Haines
children.description: Gabriel Haines is a public figure who creates both short and long form content to educate people about the cryptocurrency space

children.name: Messari
children.description: Messari is a platform that aggredates multiple datasets and creates dashboards for users to explore information about asset prices, DeFi statistics, research papers and more.

children.name: Rekt
children.description: Rekt is a exploit tracker on the Ethereum network - it tracks how much money was lost in the exploit and as well who audited the protocol (if any)

children.name: Santiment
children.description: Santiment is a platform that aggredates multiple datasets and creates dashboards for users to explore information about the cryptocurrency space.

children.name: The daily gwei
children.description: The Daily Gwei is a daily newsletter created by influencer Anthony Sassano about the Ethereum ecosystem.

children.name: Token daily
children.description: Token daily is a journalistic platform that keeps its audience up to date with the lastest events happening in the cryptocurrency space.

children.name: Crypto security 101
children.description: A medium article for newcomers entering the space to gain some best-practices for crypto security.

children.name: Crypto scam db
children.description: CryptoScamDB is dedicated to creating a safer cryptospace by educating the public on best security practices, uncovering malicious actors, and exposing scams, as well as providing scam detection services that can be integrated into existing products.

children.name: DNS checker
children.description: Check DNS Propagation worldwide. DNS Checker provides name server propagation check instantly. Changed nameservers so do a DNS lookup and check if DNS and nameservers have propagated.

children.name: UrlScan
children.description: urlscan.io - Website scanner for suspicious and malicious URLs
